form.email: Please provide a valid email address.
form.passwordMismatch: The password and the confirmation password do not match.
form.weakPassword: The password should have at least 8 characters, 1 uppercase, 1 lowercase and 1 special character.

error.authenticationFailed: Authentication failed! Please check your credentials!
error.userDisabled: This account is disabled! Please contact an administrator in order to remediate this problem!
error.accessDenied: You do not have access to this resource! Please review your permissions!
error.tokenExpired: Your session has expired. Please log in again.
error.userWithUsernameExists: A user with this username already exists.
error.userWithEmailExists: A user with this email already exists.
error.userNotEnabled: Your account is not yet activated. Please check your email.
error.userAuthenticationFailed: Authentication failed. Please check your credentials.
error.expiredVerificationToken: This verification link has expired. Please request a new one.
error.verificationTokenNotFound: Verification link not found or already used.
error.invalidDataProvided: Invalid data provided. Please check your input.
error.validationFailed: Validation failed. Please check your input.
error.adminShouldUseBackOffice: Admin and accounting users should use the back-office application.

register.title: Register
register.success: Account created successfully! Please check your email to verify your account.

confirmEmail.successMessage: Your email has been verified successfully. You can now log in to your account.
confirmEmail.failed: Email verification failed. The link may be expired or invalid.

deleteConfirmation.title: Confirm deletion
deleteConfirmation.defaultMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this resource? The action is irreversible and may result in the permanent loss of data!
